body.name: Double Edge Safety Razor for Women, Single Blade Razors for Women, with 10 Platinum Coated Razor Blades, Men's Reusable Metal Razor, Free of Plastic, Rose Gold
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 46 mins
features: 💖Warm Tips💖1. Please make sure the blade is installed correctly, otherwise the safety razor will not work properly. 2. Safety razors are different from cartridge razors, Please apply less pressure or no pressure when using them, use short and gentle strokes!!!

✅Superior Blade Quality: BULIMICA safety razor blades are crafted with USA stainless steel, ensuring a sharp and durable shaving experience. The blades are designed to minimize irritation and provide a smooth shave every time.Each double edge razor blade can be used about 5-15 times.

✅Beginner Friendly: BULIMICA safety razors have been meticulously designed with user comfort in mind and blade replacement is very easy. With its unigue texturedgrip and comfortable weight, you can easily controland slide at a 30-degree angle for a smooth, close, clean shave without irritation or ingrown hairs.

✅Cost-Effective Solution: Compared to disposable razors or cartridge razors, BULIMICA safety razors offer a cost-effective option in the long run. Once you invest in our razor, you only need to replace the blades periodically, resulting in significant savings over time.

✅Reusable & Waste Less: By using a reusable safety razor, buyers reduce their contribution to plastic waste generated by disposable razors or cartridge systems. It's a small step towards a greener planet.

✅Customer Satisfaction: We prioritize customer satisfaction and strive to provide excellent service. Our product undergoes rigorous quality checks to ensure it meets the highest standards. If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, please don't hesitate to contact our World Class Customer Service Team and we'll provide a satisfying solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to try a safety razor and someone recommended trying a less expensive one to see if I liked it before investing in an expensive one. I'm about a week in and really like it. No nicks or cuts to date and I've seen my razor burn go away. Learning to shave under my nose and right under my chin has been a challenge, but I think I've got it figured out. I'll definitely continue and I'm not sure I'll buy a more expensive razor, this seems to do a great job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As this is my first manual razor, all I can say is that it's very good. Not many nicks & cuts, but it may be because I am just a beginner. The razors themselves seem to only last for 2 or 3 shaves, then they get very dull.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best I've ever used
reviews.reviewText: I prefer safety razors over you gillete MACH 17's with extra gel glide strips...Honestly, these razors shave nearly as good as those at a fraction the cost.I've been using safety razors exclusively now for about 7 years. I've used razors like this (screw on) and I've used butterflies. I like butterflies for convenience, but screw ons shave better in my opinion. Also, I've had butterflies come loose once or twice. More than enough to know I don't want to do it another time.This razor sits in my stubby sausage fingers just fine. I am able to swap blades with ease. And clean us is a breeze.Out of the 9 or so safety razors I have purchased, I would put this top 2 easily. And I would order this same stick again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great razor unbelievable results. Very easy to clean and I get a very close shave with less strokes. I use it shave my head and my face. This is my go to razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best budget Razor period
reviews.reviewText: Was used to the cartridge razors and because i got ingrown hair and irritation i began using a electric shaver/trimmer but it never gave me a smooth shave. When i used this razor the first time, of course with caution and a good shaving soap, i got the best shave ever ZERO irritation and no ingrown hairs. A pack of 5 Astra superior platinum costs $0.6 at my local convenience store. A month has passed and i still have 2 blades left. I use 1 blade almost 5 times before i change it out. For 9 bucks this is the best investment ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Slices your kneck open like a horror movie
reviews.reviewText: I bought these because I was using Gillette pro glide and they worked 8/10 I saw these and I was insured it would work even better but hell nawh buy these if you want to be in an extra in SCREAM cus I basically sliced my kneck open man even with the best shaving cream being super careful taking all precautions I should have known lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good entry level shaver, simple and easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: It is an entry-saver that gives you an average cut. Please know that if you just move from a regular commercial shaver to a single one like this one, your face will go through a period of adaptation. Do not expect that you may not have a minor cut or irritated spot, etc. Your face skin needs to get used to it like we get used to new shoes by wearing them. I like that it is easy to use, easy to clean, and easy to maintain. Blades sit correctly in the enclosure, instructions are easy, it is not too heavy to use, and once you get used to it, it is fairly comfortable to handle. It is not bad for the practice, however, once I get used to it I plan to buy something better in regards to the hair closeness. It is a good first start for anybody trying to drop the commercial shavers who are growing your hair under your skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent razor, agressive blades
reviews.reviewText: My go-to DE shaver is the Merkur 34C combined with either the Gilette Platinum or the Perma-Sharp DE blades, but I’m not above trying a new shaver and I was curious how this shaver would compare.The first thing I noticed about this DE shaver when I took it out of the package was that, despite it having a longer handle than my Merkur, it was actually lighter. Comparing the two on a kitchen scale, it turned out that this shaver weighs 1.7 oz and the Merkur came in at 2.8 oz (both with a blade installed).The blade was fairly easy to install, but taking it out after shaving was a tad bit more difficult as the blade stuck to the shaver due to the water that got in between. I had to be really careful not to cut myself while taking it out. Personally, I feel that this happened due to the design of the shaver, as you need to disassemble both the bottom and the top of the head instead of having the bottom of the head still attached to the handle when you take out or insert the blade. In the case of the latter, you’d be at much less risk of cutting yourself.Shaving with this razor was easy enough. While I prefer a bit more weight to my shaver, I was able to get a decent shave out of it. That being said, I do feel the blades that come along with this razor are fairly aggressive and I had to be a lot more careful than normal not to give myself a nick. However, once I placed a Gilette Platinum DE blade into the razor, the aggressiveness was no longer an issue. While this razor is marketed as a beginner-friendly razor, the blades kind of take that away and I would suggest any beginner looking into this razor to buy a set of different blades to go along with it (my suggestion would be to get a sampler pack, so you can figure out which one you like).This shaver comes in decent packaging, with thank-you stickers on the top and bottom as a way to seal the package. Unfortunately, the glue had given out on the side, which made it possible to take out the shaver and blades without breaking the seals. A third sticker on the side would be nice, as to create another seal in case the glue gives out.While I will keep my Merkur as my go-to DE shaver, this DE razor is definitely a nice one and I will keep it as my travel razor.
